name: brad-ashworth
description: Brad Ashworth's Personal website to show his Art and store

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:html: npm run clean:html && cp client/index.html server/endpoints/build/
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar client/index.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:css: npm run build:css:unminified && npm run build:css:minified
scripts.watch:css: npm run watch:css:unminified & npm run watch:css:minified
scripts.clean:css: npm run clean:css:unminified && npm run clean:css:minified
scripts.watch:css:unminified: npm run build:css:unminified && chokidar 'client/css/**/*.(css|less)' -c 'npm run build:css:unminified'
scripts.watch:css:minified: npm run build:css:minified && chokidar 'client/css/**/*.(css|less)' -c 'npm run build:css:minified'
scripts.build:js: npm run build:js:unminified && npm run build:js:minified
scripts.watch:js: npm run watch:js:unminified & npm run watch:js:minified
scripts.clean:js: npm run clean:js:unminified && npm run clean:js:minified
scripts.devstart: npm run w:watch & npm run w:start
scripts.w:build: npm run w:clean && npm run w:mkdir && npm run w:build:html && npm run w:build:css && npm run w:build:js
scripts.ww:watch: npm run w:build && chokidar client\**\**\**\* -c "npm run w:build"
scripts.w:watch: npm run w:watch:html & npm run w:watch:css & npm run w:watch:js
scripts.w:build:html: npm run w:clean:html && copy client\index.html server\endpoints\build\
scripts.w:watch:html: npm run w:build:html && chokidar client\index.html -c "npm run w:build:html"
scripts.w:build:css: npm run w:build:css:unminified && npm run w:build:css:minified
scripts.w:watch:css: npm run w:watch:css:unminified & npm run w:watch:css:minified
scripts.w:clean:css: npm run w:clean:css:unminified && npm run w:clean:css:minified
scripts.w:watch:css:unminified: npm run w:build:css:unminified && chokidar "client\css\**\*.(css|less)" -c "npm run w:build:css:unminified"
scripts.w:watch:css:minified: npm run w:build:css:minified && chokidar "client\css\**\*.(css|less)" -c "npm run w:build:css:minified"
scripts.w:build:js: npm run w:build:js:unminified && npm run w:build:js:minified
scripts.w:watch:js: npm run w:watch:js:unminified & npm run w:watch:js:minified
scripts.w:clean:js: npm run w:clean:js:unminified && npm run w:clean:js:minified

author: Kylo Jorgensen <kylo.j.jorgensen@gmail.com>
